title: How to change bootstrap tabs from code behind c#
body:
i want to change bootstrap tab from code behind. i have two tabs on my aspx page. first tab contains text fields and second contains gridview. when user clicks gridview's command field edit button then i want to switch back to first tab with all data of clicked row. everything is working as expected but tab not changing. and when user clicks on delete command button then selected tab should maintain on postback.

<ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="myTabs">
                                <li>

                                        style="font-size: 13px; color: #2E4053; font-weight: 700;">Add Product </a>
                                </li>
